bibl.title: Sostrat Knidskij, Ptolemej i zakhvat Memfisa: problema datirovki. Avec résumé en anglais: Sostratus of Cnidus, Ptolemy and the Capture of Memphis: Problem of Dating.
bibl.note: The episode cited by Lucian (Hipp. 1-3) should be connected with the events of the autumn 323-322 B.C. when Satrap Ptolemy entered into an armed conflict with Cleomenes of Naucratis.
LITVINENKO Yu.N., Sostrat Knidskij, Ptolemej i zakhvat Memfisa: problema datirovki. Avec résumé en anglais: Sostratus of Cnidus, Ptolemy and the Capture of Memphis: Problem of Dating.
